/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, bathed in sunlight, stretches out ahead, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. The trees, a mix of green and brown, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The image is a blend of urban architecture and natural elements, showcasing the harmonious coexistence of man-made structures and nature in Beijing.
